thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners join race for £15m Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart as Arsene Wenger eyes replacement for Petr Cech
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners join race for £15m Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart as Arsene Wenger eyes replacement for Petr Cech

author: jgordon
title: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners join race for £15m Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart as Arsene Wenger eyes replacement for Petr Cech
text:
EFL hart take Arsenal transfer news: Gunners join race for £15m Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart as Arsene Wenger eyes replacement for Petr Cech 
Arsene Wenger plotting raid for Manchester City stopper, who is also on Liverpool's radar Gossip Comments ARSENAL are eyeing a move for Joe Hart as they search for Petr Cech’s replacement. 
The Manchester City stopper – who has also been linked with Liverpool and West Ham – is not in Pep Guardiola’s plans. Getty Images 3 Joe Hart is a target for Arsenal and Liverpool with his Manchester City career all but over 
And Gunners boss Arsene Wenger wants to install him above 34-year-old Cech as his No1 this summer, according to the Daily Mail. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Hart, 29, is currently on loan at Torino and City will look to offload him and his £130,000 per week wages. 
Liverpool are likely to provide stiff competition, with Jurgen Klopp seeing defensive blunders undermine his attacking side. Related Stories All change at Anfield Daniel Sturridge out and Joe Hart in as Jurgen Klopp plots massive summer shake-up at Liverpool HART DONE BY Unlucky Joe Hart left red-faced as Torino team-mate's backpass lands in puddle... and gifts Empoli a tap-in Hart's new home? Man City outcast Joe Hart will be West Ham's top transfer target as Slaven Bilic lines up £15m bid I WANT MOR Chelsea boss Antonio Conte will let Thibaut Courtois go to Real Madrid.. only if he gets Alvaro Morata in return In our Hart Liverpool to make shock swoop for Manchester City goalkeeper Joe Hart this summer Take Hart Chelsea senior stars tell boss Antonio Conte to buy Joe Hart if Thibaut Courtois joins Real Madrid 
City could demand a fee of £15million-plus for the keeper – who is under contract until 2019 – but may sell on the cheap to a foreign club. 
England international Hart has settled well to life in Serie A after making a late move following Guardiola’s decision to favour Claudio Bravo and Willy Caballero. Getty Images Joe Hart was bombed out of City by Pep Guardiola in a shock move and joined Torino News Group Newspapers Ltd Hartwould prefer to return to England as he faces competition for the England No1 jersey Joe Hart gets studded in the face playing for Torino but bravely battles on 
Torino cannot afford his wages, however, and the loanee is keen to return to England. 
Wenger will also have to decide on Wojciech Szczesny's future if he returns from his loan at Roma, who may decide to buy. 
The Pole's deal runs out in 2018 and the Gunners need to either renew his contract or sell him. 
Szczesny is reportedly keen to challenge for the No1 jersey but with Wenger stepping up his keeper search, it is unlikely he will get a chance. JOE HART in bizarre video after starring in Torino's 5-1 demolition of
